entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
